javelin.model.item

Class Scroll

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.item.Item
      • javelin.model.item.Scroll
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Scroll
extends Item
    Can only be used out-of-combat. The lore concept is that there is actually a non-combatant able spellcaster (or at least spellreader) accompanying each Squad.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
